description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, handling incoming HTTP requests, generating server-side rendering streams, and managing CORS headers. It distinguishes between bot and browser user agents to optimize responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler differentiating between bot and browser clients and setting CORS headers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering stream for bot requests, returning a complete response once ready.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering stream for browser requests, returning an early response to improve performance.
